message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $999000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but $999000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $850000 is a bit lower than my initial asking price, but I'm willing to negotiate. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $925000. This is a fair compromise considering its value and rarity. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $875000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I understand that you're still looking to save some money, Bob. However, I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $900000. This is as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $875000. I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet at this price. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
